Reviews.Title: Wireless Cam Hunter with Built in DVR
Reviews.Author: faisel
Reviews.Content: it's hunt just wireless camera not all camera I was thinking all camera and do u have some think hunt all kind of camera

ProductInfo.Features:
LCD Screen: 2.5" Color TFT LCD
Scanning Range: 900~2800MHz
Scanning Mode: Normal, Preset, Mask
Video Format: ASF
Picture Format: JPG
Video Recording Mode: Auto, Manual
Recording Capability: 640x480
Frame Rate: Up to 25fps
External Video Input: Yes
External Audio Input: Yes
Storage Type: Micro SD Card (32GB Max)
Data Interface: Mini USB 2.0
Video Compatibility: NTSC/PAL
Date/Time Stamp: Yes
Alert: Vibration/Buzzer
Sensitivity: High/Med/Low
Power Input: DC 5V/2A Adapter
Battery: DC 3.7V/4400 mAH Li-ion battery
Charger Indication: LED Indication Light
Battery Life: Approx 2.5 hours
Battery Indication: Yes - Gauge on Display
Size: 122x74x28mm
Weight: 184g
ProductInfo.Name: Mini Wireless Cam Hunter with Built in DVR
